notice.ch: 重修大一體育請至體育室教學組拿密碼卡

remark.ch: 重修大一體育請至體育室教學組拿密碼卡

goal.ch:
一、運動傷害預防及運動安全。
二、游泳基本技能與知識。   
三、各種基本體能鍛鍊法。 
四、從事運動的正確方法與知識。
goal.en:
1. Sports injury prevention and sports safety.
2. Basic swimming skills and knowledge.
3. Various basic physical exercise methods.
4. The correct method and knowledge to engage in sports.

outline.ch:
一、學校體育概況與運動設施介紹：課務、場地、器材借用、競賽活動。
二、伸展操：1.注意事項(生理方面、動作型態、實施要領、心理方面)；2.動作簡介及操作。
三、體適能測驗（前測）：1.男─1600 公尺；女─800 公尺；2.一分鐘仰臥起坐；3.立定跳遠；4.身體質量指數及體脂肪百分比；5.坐姿體前彎；6.敏捷；7.認知功能。
四、游泳：1.基本水上安全知識講解；2.熟悉水性─水中走、跑、跳、韻律呼吸；3.兩人一組漂浮練習；4.蹬池底漂浮及水中站立。
五、游泳：1.蹬牆漂浮及水中站立；2.水母漂動作要領講解、操作；3.捷泳腿部動作講解、示範、操作；4.扶水道繩打水，練習者由同伴拉著練習打水。
六、游泳：1.複習捷泳腿部動作；2.捷泳臂部動作：入水→抱水→划水→出水→空中移臂→兩臂配合；3.陸上模仿動作、水中行走動作練習；4.腿夾浮板練習划手。
七、游泳：1.複習捷泳腿部動作；2.捷泳臂部動作；3.捷泳手腳配合動作 4.直臂划水、屈臂划水練習。
八、團體遊戲活動（校運趣味競賽項目）：1.負重接力；2.兩人兩腳；3.滾輪胎；4.同舟共濟；5.袋鼠跳；6.一分耕耘一分收穫。
九、游泳：1.捷泳完整動作練習：蹬牆→打腿→划臂→換氣。
十、游泳：1.複習捷泳手腳配合動作；2.捷泳換氣動作講解；3.原地體前屈臉部入水練習；4.水中行走單臂划水與呼吸練習；5.換氣與臂部動作配合；6.換氣與完整動作配合。
十一、術科測驗（游泳二十一公尺及水母漂測驗）。
十二、興趣選項課程介紹及球類運動。
十三、投擲運動：壘球擲遠。
十四、術科測驗（壘球擲遠）。
十五、體適能測驗（後測）：1.男─1600 公尺；女─800 公尺；2.一分鐘仰臥起坐；3.立定跳遠；4.身體質量指數及體脂肪百分比；5.坐姿體前彎；6.敏捷；7.認知功能。
十六、術科測驗（3000m跑）、體育常識測驗（筆試）。
十七、教師補考週。
十八、教師彈性補充教學。
outline.en:
1. General situation of school sports and introduction of sports facilities: lessons, venues, equipment borrowing, competitions.
2. Stretching exercises: (1) Precautions (physiological aspects, movement types, implementation essentials, psychological aspects); (2) Brief introduction and operation of movements.
3. Physical fitness test (pre-test): (1) Men - 1600 meters; women - 800 meters; (2) One-minute sit-ups; (3) Standing long jump; (4) Body mass index and body fat percentage; (5) Seated forward bending; (6) Agility; (7) Cognitive function.
4. Swimming: (1) Explanation of basic water safety knowledge; (2). Familiarity with water-walking, running, jumping, and rhythmic breathing in water; (3) Floating exercises in groups of two; (4) Floating on the bottom of the pool and standing in the water.
5. Swimming: (1) Floating on the wall and standing in the water; (2) Explanation and operation of jellyfish floating movements; (3) Explanation, demonstration and operation of freestyle leg movements; Practice fetching water.
6. Swimming: (1) Review the leg movements of freestyle; (2) Arm movements of freestyle: entering the water → holding the water → stroke → exiting the water → moving arms in the air → coordination of both arms; (3) Practice imitating movements on land and walking in water; (4) Clamp the kickboard to practice paddling.
7. Swimming: (1) Review freestyle leg movements; (2) Freestyle arm movements; (3) Freestyle hand and foot coordination movements; (4) Straight arm stroke and bent arm stroke practice.
8. Group game activities (interesting competitions in school sports): (1) Weight-bearing relay; (2) Two people with two feet; (3) Rolling tires;
9. Swimming: (1) Freestyle complete movement practice: wall
kicking → leg kicking → arm stroke → breathing.
10. Swimming: (1) Review the hand-foot coordination of freestyle swimming; (2) Explanation of freestyle breathing movements; (3) Practice bending forward with the face in place; (4) Walking in water with one arm stroke and breathing exercises; (5) Breathing Cooperate with arm movements; (6) Breathe and coordinate with complete movements.
11. Skill test (Swimming 21 meters and jellyfish drift).
12. Introduction to courses of interest and ball games.
13. throwing sports: softball throwing.
14. Skill test (softball throw).
15. Physical fitness test (post-test): (1) Men - 1600 meters; women - 800 meters; (2) One-minute sit-ups; (3) Standing long jump; (4) Body mass index and body fat percentage; (5) Seated forward bending; (6) Agility; (7) Cognitive function.
16. Skill test (3000m run), physical education general knowledge test (written test).
17. Teacher make-up exam week.
18. Teachers can supplement teaching flexibly.

gradMethod.ch:
一、體育常識測驗：20％            
二、出席勤惰及學習精神：20％
三、術科測驗：60％
gradMethod.en:
1. Physical education general knowledge test : 20％
2. Attendance, diligence and learning spirit: 20％
3. Skill test: 60％
